all.name: Desert Dasher
all.description: Desert Dashers are fast-moving creatures that inhabit the dry, sandy expanses of the desert. They are quadrupedal, with lean, muscular bodies and long legs that allow them to run quickly and gracefully across the sand. They have short, sleek fur that is a sandy brown color, helping them blend in with their environment. Desert Dashers are primarily herbivorous, feeding on small plants and vegetation that they find in the desert.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a swift, quadrupedal creature with lean, muscular legs and short, sandy-brown fur. The creature should appear to be running at full speed across a desert landscape, with the wind blowing through its fur.

all.name: Murkroot
all.description: The Murkroot is a hideous creature of the swamp. It resembles a large humanoid figure with two sets of arms ending in long, gnarled fingers. Their skin is slimy and speckled with muck, their eyes glow yellow in the dark. Murkroots can rapidly regrow lost limbs, and they use this ability to ambush their prey.
all.imagePrompt: Create an image of a large, humanoid figure with two sets of arms ending in gnarled fingers. Its skin is slimy and speckled with muck, and its eyes glow yellow in the dark. It should appear to be lurking in a dark, murky swamp.

all.name: Swamp Serpent
all.description: The Swamp Serpent is a large, aquatic creature that inhabits murky swamp waters. Its long, sinuous body is covered in slimy, mossy scales, and its eyes glow a deep red. It can breathe both air and water and camouflages itself in the swamp's muck to ambush prey.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large, sinuous creature with mossy scales and glowing red eyes. The creature should appear to blend into the swamp environment it inhabits.

all.name: Sandstrider
all.description: The Sandstrider is a large, camel-like creature that inhabits the vast deserts. It stands at 6 feet tall and 7 feet long, with a sandy brown coat that helps it camouflage into the desert landscape. Its most noticeable feature is its long, curved horns that extend from its forehead and can be used for defense. The Sandstrider is a strong and resilient creature that can travel long distances in search of water and food.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large, camel-like creature with sand brown fur, long curved horns, and a powerful physique. The creature should appear to blend seamlessly into the desert environment it inhabits.

all.name: Aqueon
all.description: The Aqueon is a mysterious aquatic creature that dwells in the depths of the ocean. It resembles a translucent, quadrupedal creature with long, flowing tentacles and a bioluminescent glow. Its behavior is elusive and unpredictable, often moving around in a slow, hypnotic manner until it suddenly lunges at its prey with lightning-fast speed.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a translucent aquatic creature with long, flowing tentacles and a bioluminescent glow. It should have quadrupedal features and appear both mesmerizing and menacing at the same time.

all.name: Mountain Frost Wyrm
all.description: The Mountain Frost Wyrm is a massive creature that inhabits the highest mountain peaks. It is covered in shimmering white scales that reflect the sunlight, making it almost invisible against the snow. It has powerful legs, sharp talons, and a long, sinuous body that allows it to move easily over rugged terrain.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a massive, shimmering white dragon-like creature with sharp talons and a sinuous body. The creature should be shown scaling a steep mountain peak, with its scales reflecting the sunlight and making it almost invisible against the snow.

all.name: Grassland Stomper
all.description: The Grassland Stomper is a massive, four-legged creature that roams the open plains. It stands 8 feet tall at the shoulder, with thick, shaggy fur. Its horned head is nearly flat, with a wide, blunt snout, and small, dark eyes. It has massive, cloven hooves that thunder across the plains.
all.imagePrompt: Create an image of a massive, shaggy creature with a horned head and cloven hooves that dominate the plains. The creature should look powerful and awe-inspiring, while also conveying a sense of calm strength.

behaviors.description: Grassland Stompers are fiercely territorial. When threatened, they will charge their enemies head-on, delivering a powerful blow with their massive horns.
Despite their fearsome appearance, Grassland Stompers are generally peaceful herbivores. They spend most of their day grazing on grasses and other plants.

abilities.name: Keen Smell
abilities.description: Grassland Stompers have a keen sense of smell, which they use to detect predators and find food.

abilities.name: Intimidation
abilities.description: Grassland Stompers' massive size and powerful presence can be intimidating to other creatures. They gain advantage on intimidation checks.

all.name: Cavern Crawler
all.description: Cavern Crawlers are nocturnal creatures that inhabit deep underground caves. They are about the size of a large dog and are covered in shiny, black chitin. They have long, slender limbs with sharp claws that allow them to cling to walls and ceilings. Their eyes are large and compound, allowing them to see in complete darkness.
all.imagePrompt: Create an image of a dog-sized creature covered in shiny black chitin with long, slender limbs and sharp claws. The creature should appear to be clinging to the wall or ceiling of a dark, underground cavern.

specialAbilities.name: Wall Clinger
specialAbilities.description: Cavern Crawlers can cling to walls and ceilings as easily as they move on the ground.

specialAbilities.name: Darkvision
specialAbilities.description: Cavern Crawlers can see in complete darkness.

all.name: Cave Crawler
all.description: Cave Crawlers are small, spider-like creatures that inhabit underground caves. They have six spindly legs and a round, bulbous body covered in a thick layer of fur. Their eyes are nearly invisible in the dark, but they are able to sense their environment through vibrations and echolocation. Cave Crawlers are highly adaptable and can survive on a variety of food sources, including insects and fungi.
all.imagePrompt: Create an image of a spider-like creature with six spindly legs and a round, bulbous body covered in fur. The creature should appear well-adapted to the dark, underground environment.

all.name: Swamp Hunter
all.description: The Swamp Hunter is a large, predatory creature that lurks in the murky waters of swamps. It has a sleek, scale-covered body, four powerful legs, and a long, serpentine tail. Its jaws are lined with rows of razor-sharp teeth, and its eyes glow a sinister yellow in the dark.
all.imagePrompt: Create an image of a large, predatory creature that lurks in the murky waters of swamps. Its body should be scale-covered, and it should have four powerful legs and a long, serpentine tail. Its jaws should be lined with rows of razor-sharp teeth, and its eyes should glow a sinister yellow in the dark.

specialAbilities.name: Swamp Ambush
specialAbilities.description: The Swamp Hunter has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that is unaware of its presence.

specialAbilities.name: Swimming
specialAbilities.description: The Swamp Hunter can swim at a speed of 40 feet.

all.name: Mountain Behemoth
all.description: The Mountain Behemoth is a massive creature that inhabits high altitude mountain ranges. Covered in thick fur and armored plates, it resembles a cross between a gorilla and a rhinoceros. Large, curved horns adorn its head and a long, thick tail balances its weight as it travels steep terrain. Its booming roar can be heard for miles and it is known for its fierce protectiveness of its territory and young.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a massive, gorilla-like creature with thick fur, armored plates, and large, curved horns. It should be shown climbing steep terrain with its long, thick tail balancing its weight.

all.name: Aqualid
all.description: Aqualids are aquatic beings that resemble a mix between a seahorse and a serpent. They have a long, serpentine body covered in scales, with multiple pairs of small fins running the length of their body. Their head resembles that of a seahorse, complete with a long snout and bony plates on their skin. They have four pairs of independently moving eyes which allow them to see in almost any direction, and their long, prehensile tail allows them to grip onto objects and navigate through the water with great speed.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of an Aqualid, showing off their sleek, serpentine body and seahorse-like head. Include their multiple pairs of small fins and bony plates, and show off their four pairs of independently moving eyes.

all.name: Rockhorn
all.description: Rockhorns are massive creatures that live in high mountain environments. They have a thick, shaggy fur that ranges from white to grey to brown. Their most striking feature is their large, curved horns which are made of a mixture of bone and rock. These horns are used for both defense and hunting as they can easily pierce through tough mountain terrain and prey. Rockhorns are solitary animals with a fierce, territorial nature.
all.imagePrompt: Create an image of a massive mountain creature with thick, shaggy fur that ranges from white to brown and curved horns made of bone and rock. The creature should have a fierce, territorial expression and be shown in a mountainous environment.

all.name: Verdant Strider
all.description: Verdant Striders inhabit lush forests. They resemble large, quadrupedal insects with long, slender legs and vibrant green, leaf-like wings. They feed on tree sap using their sharp, needle-like proboscis and have a symbiotic relationship with the forest.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large, insect-like creature with long, slender legs, vibrant green, leaf-like wings, and a sharp, needle-like proboscis. The creature should appear to blend seamlessly with the lush forest environment it inhabits.

all.name: Frost Reaver
all.description: Frost Reavers are fearsome creatures that inhabit icy tundras. They resemble a cross between a polar bear and a walrus, with thick, white fur, long tusks, and sharp claws. They are solitary creatures and fiercely territorial, attacking anything that comes too close to their territory.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a ferocious creature with the body of a polar bear, the tusks of a walrus, and razor-sharp claws. The creature should be covered in thick, white fur and be shown in a snow-covered, icy tundra environment.

all.name: Sand Stalker
all.description: Sand Stalkers are fierce predators of the desert, resembling a blend of lion and scorpion. Their large, muscular bodies are covered in tough, sandy-colored skin, and they have sharp claws and a long, segmented tail ending in a venomous stinger. Additionally, they have powerful mandibles and can sense vibrations in the sand to locate prey.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large, sandy-colored creature resembling a blend of lion and scorpion. It should have sharp claws, a segmented tail with a venomous stinger, and powerful mandibles. The creature should also appear to be detecting nearby prey with its sensitive, vibration-sensing antennae.

specialAbilities.name: Vibration Sense
specialAbilities.description: The Sand Stalker can sense vibrations in the sand up to 60 feet away, allowing it to detect the presence of nearby creatures.

specialAbilities.name: Venomous Stinger
specialAbilities.description: When the Sand Stalker successfully hits a creature with its stinger, that creature must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take an additional 2d6 poison damage and become paralyzed for 1 minute.

all.name: Swamp Stalker
all.description: Swamp Stalkers are large, reptilian creatures that inhabit wetlands and swamps. They have thick, scaly skin that provides natural camouflage, and they are capable of slipping silently through the murky water and tall grass. Their long, muscular tail is used for balance and propulsion in the water, and they have powerful, clawed limbs for crawling through the mud and capturing prey. Their eyes are particularly adapted to darkness, and they have a high level of intelligence and cunning.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large, reptilian creature crawling through murky water and tall grass in a swampy environment. The creature should have thick, scaly skin and powerful, clawed limbs.

all.name: Sand Shifter
all.description: The Sand Shifter is a desert creature that has adapted to live in the harsh, arid environment. It resembles a large, serpentine lizard with a thick hide covered in sand-colored scales. Its body is highly flexible, allowing it to move effortlessly through the shifting sands. Its eyes are large and lidless, providing it with excellent vision in the bright desert sun. The Sand Shifter feeds on small rodents and insects, which it locates using its sharp sense of smell.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large, serpentine lizard covered in sand-colored scales. The creature should have large, lidless eyes and a highly flexible body that allows it to move effortlessly through the shifting sands of the desert.

all.name: Sand Strider
all.description: Sand Striders are fierce desert-dwelling creatures. They have a body similar to a scorpion with six legs and a long, curved tail with a stinger at the end. Their body is covered in tough, scaly skin that allows them to blend in with the desert environment. They are highly aggressive and will attack anything that enters their territory.
all.imagePrompt: Create an image of a Sand Strider in its natural environment. The creature should be shown with its curved tail, ready to attack trespassers who enter its territory.

all.name: Swampstone Creeper
all.description: The Swampstone Creeper is a large, amphibious creature that inhabits murky swamps. Its body is made of hardened moss and stone, allowing it to blend in with the environment. Its eyes glow in the dark, enabling it to see in low light conditions. It moves slowly, but can surprise its prey with sudden bursts of speed and strength, utilizing its powerful arms to catch them.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a Swampstone Creeper, a large amphibious creature with a body made of hardened moss and stone, glowing eyes, and powerful arms. The creature should be shown hiding among the murky waters and vegetation of a swamp.

all.name: Grassland Pouncer
all.description: Grassland Pouncers are sleek, feline predators that prowl the grassy plains. They have short, mottled fur that blends in perfectly with the tall grasses, and powerful legs that allow them to sprint after prey. Their sharp claws and teeth make them deadly hunters, but they are also intelligent and adaptable creatures that can survive in a variety of environments.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a sleek, feline creature with short, mottled fur that blends in perfectly with the tall grasses of the plains. The creature should be shown crouching low to the ground, ready to pounce on its prey with its sharp claws and teeth.

all.name: Mountain Drake
all.description: The Mountain Drake is a ferocious predator that roams the high peaks of the world's tallest ranges. Their bodies are covered in dark scales with accents of fiery red and orange along their spine. Their wings are large and leathery, allowing them to soar on the powerful mountain thermals. They have sharp claws and teeth, with a long, sinewy tail that they use to balance themselves on precarious ledges.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a Mountain Drake. It should have a fearsome appearance with dark scales, fiery red and orange accents, large leathery wings, sharp claws and teeth, and a long, sinewy tail. The background should portray a treacherous mountainous habitat of cliffs and snow.

all.name: Swamp Dweller
all.description: Swamp Dwellers are amphibious creatures that inhabit murky swamps. They have slimy, mottled green skin and large, bulbous eyes that glow in the dark. They have long, webbed fingers and toes for swimming and climbing, and can secrete a toxic slime from their skin as defense.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of an amphibious creature with slimy, mottled green skin, large bulbous eyes that glow in the dark, and long webbed fingers and toes for swimming and climbing. The creature should be depicted in its murky swamp environment, possibly secreting its toxic slime.

all.name: Grassland Stomper
all.description: The Grassland Stomper is a large, quadrupedal creature that resembles a cross between a bison and a rhinoceros. It stands six feet tall at the shoulder and has a broad, muscular build. Its hide is a mottled gray color and is covered in shaggy fur. On its head is a single, curving horn that is six inches long. Despite its imposing size, the Grassland Stomper is a herbivore and grazes on the grasses that cover the plains. It has a slow and lumbering gait but can move surprisingly fast when threatened.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large, shaggy quadrupedal creature with a mottled gray hide and a single curving horn on its head. It should be grazing on a grassy plain with a few trees in the background.

all.name: Silt Crawler
all.description: Silt Crawlers are slimy creatures that inhabit murky swamps. They resemble large, crab-like creatures with multiple legs and long, tentacle-like antennae. Their skin is covered in a thick layer of slimy mucus that helps protect them from predators and traps their prey. They feed on small fish and insects that they catch with their sharp claws.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a slimy, crab-like creature with multiple legs, long, tentacle-like antennae, and a thick layer of slimy mucus covering its skin. The creature should be shown in a murky swamp environment, possibly with a small fish or insect trapped in its claws.

abilities.name: Slimy Mucus
abilities.description: The Silt Crawler's thick layer of slimy mucus adds +2 to its AC and makes it difficult to grapple or restrain.

abilities.name: Underwater Ambush
abilities.description: When in water, the Silt Crawler can remain completely still and undetectable. It can use this to ambush its prey, adding +4 to its initiative roll.

all.name: Glacial Leviathan
all.description: The Glacial Leviathan is a massive, serpentine creature that inhabits the icy deeps. It has iridescent, silver-blue scales that shimmer in the dark, and its eyes glow with an otherworldly light. To navigate its icy environment, the Glacial Leviathan has webbed, fin-like legs that allow it to swim with impressive speed and agility. Its jaws are incredibly powerful, capable of snapping through thick ice, and it can launch a barrage of icy projectiles from its mouth.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a massive, serpentine creature with iridescent, silver-blue scales, and webbed, fin-like legs. Its jaws should appear powerful and capable of snapping through thick ice. The creature is surrounded by a shower of icy projectiles launched from its mouth.

all.name: Cave Crawler
all.description: The Cave Crawler is a nocturnal creature that is well-adapted to life in underground caves. Its body is long and serpent-like, with six legs and a pair of sharp claws. Its skin is tough and leathery, with a mottled brown and black pattern that helps it blend into the cave environment. The Cave Crawler is a solitary animal and is highly territorial.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a Cave Crawler. The creature should have a long, serpentine body, six legs with sharp claws, and tough, leathery skin with a mottled brown and black pattern. The environment around the creature should be dark and cave-like.

specialAbilities.name: Tunneling
specialAbilities.description: The Cave Crawler can quickly dig through soft earth and sand, allowing it to ambush prey or escape danger.

specialAbilities.name: Acid Spit
specialAbilities.description: The Cave Crawler can spit a stream of acidic saliva at its enemies. This attack deals 1d6 acid damage and has a range of 20 feet. The Cave Crawler can use this ability once per day.

all.name: Swamp Creeper
all.description: Swamp Creepers are amphibious creatures that have adapted to swamp environments. They have a long, serpentine body covered in dark, slimy scales. Their arms and legs end in webbed digits, and their eyes glow a bright yellow in the dark. Their most notable feature is their long tongue, which they use to capture prey.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of an amphibious creature with a long, serpentine body covered in dark, slimy scales. It should have webbed digits, and its eyes should glow a bright yellow in the dark. Its most notable feature is its long tongue, which it uses to capture prey in the swamp environment it inhabits.

all.name: Grassland Stalker
all.description: Grassland Stalkers are large, feline-like predators that inhabit open grasslands. They have a sleek, muscular body with short fur that ranges in color from yellow to brown, and a long, curved tail. Their sharp, retractable claws and powerful jaws make them apex predators on the grassy plains.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a sleek, muscular feline-like creature with short fur ranging from yellow to brown, powerful jaws and sharp, retractable claws. The creature should appear to blend seamlessly with the open grassland environment it inhabits.

all.name: Mire Fiend
all.description: Mire Fiends are fiendish creatures that inhabit swamps. They resemble large, hulking frogs covered in slimy, chitinous armor. Their bulging eyes bulge out of their heads and they have sharp teeth lining their wide mouths. Mire Fiends are notoriously aggressive and will attack anything that enters their territory.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a hulking, frog-like creature covered in slimy, chitinous armor. Its eyes should be bulging out of its head and it should have sharp teeth lining its wide mouth. The creature should appear to be incredibly aggressive, ready to attack anything that comes across its path.

all.name: Mountain Guardian
all.description: The Mountain Guardian is a large, ferocious predator that inhabits the rocky peaks and slopes of mountains. It has thick, shaggy fur that blends seamlessly with the rocky terrain, and short, muscular legs that allow it to scale steep cliffs with ease. Its powerful jaws are lined with razor-sharp teeth, and thick, bony plates protect its vital organs. It is fiercely territorial, and will attack any intruders that dare to enter its domain.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large, bear-like creature with thick, shaggy fur and bony plates covering its vital organs. Its short, muscular legs should be adapted for scaling steep cliffs and rocky peaks. It should have powerful jaws lined with razor-sharp teeth to represent its ferocity.

all.name: Sand Blade
all.description: Sand Blades are creatures that live in the desert. They are a type of scorpion with a flat, blade-like tail that they use to slice through sand and defend themselves. They are covered in thick, tan-colored armor that protects them from the harsh desert environment. Sand Blades are solitary creatures and only come together to mate.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a scorpion-like creature with a flat, blade-like tail and thick, tan-colored armor.

all.name: Mountain Skyrider
all.description: The Mountain Skyrider is a large, winged creature that inhabits high altitude mountain regions. It has a slender body and long, powerful wings that enable it to soar effortlessly through the air. Its feathers are a mix of deep blues and grays, blending perfectly with the mountain landscape. The Skyrider's claws are razor sharp, perfect for grasping prey.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large, winged creature that blends seamlessly with the snowy mountain environment it inhabits. The creature should have razor sharp claws and be a mix of deep blues and grays.

all.name: Frost Fang
all.description: Frost Fangs are large reptilian predators that inhabit icy regions. They have bluish-white scales, strong jaws filled with razor-sharp teeth, and a long, muscular tail that helps them maintain balance on the slippery ice. They are exceptionally fast and agile, able to sprint across icy landscapes with ease. Their bodies produce a special type of antifreeze that allows them to survive extreme cold temperatures.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large, bluish-white reptilian creature with razor-sharp teeth, a long, muscular tail, and a sleek, streamlined body that appears to be built for speed. The creature should be shown racing across an icy landscape with ease, evoking a sense of power and agility.

all.name: Cavemaw
all.description: Cavemaws inhabit deep underground caves. They appear as a cross between a spider and a centipede, with eight long, thin legs and a segmented body covered in black and dark gray hair. They have a pair of large, curved pincers for catching prey and can spit out a web-like substance to immobilize their prey.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a creature resembling a spider and centipede hybrid. It should have eight long, thin legs, a segmented body covered in black and dark gray hair, and a pair of large, curved pincers. The background should depict a dark and claustrophobic underground cave environment.

all.name: Subterranean Skulker
all.description: Subterranean Skulkers are pale, four-legged creatures with long, segmented bodies and small, glistening eyes. They navigate underground caves with ease, using their sharp claws to cling to the rocky terrain. Their sense of smell is highly developed, and they use it to hunt prey and navigate their environment. When threatened, Subterranean Skulkers release a cloud of thick, choking dust that disorients their attackers.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a pale, four-legged creature with long, segmented body, sharp claws, and small, glistening eyes. The creature should be depicted in an underground cave environment, clinging to rocky terrain.

all.name: Sand Guardian
all.description: Sand Guardians are creatures that inhabit desert environments. They are large, quadrupedal creatures with tough, segmented exoskeletons. Their bodies are covered in small protrusions that help them camouflage in the shifting sands. They have sharp claws and powerful jaws, which they use to capture prey and defend themselves from predators.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large, quadrupedal creature with a tough, segmented exoskeleton. The creature should have small protrusions covering its body that help it blend into the shifting sands. It should have sharp claws and powerful jaws.

abilities.name: Camouflage
abilities.description: The Sand Guardian has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in sandy environments.

abilities.name: Sand Burrow
abilities.description: The Sand Guardian can burrow through sandy terrain at a speed of 20 feet.

all.name: Glowfin
all.description: The Glowfin is a bioluminescent fish that lives in deep sea trenches. It has a slender body and long, flowing fins that glow brightly in the dark water. Its eyes are large and bulbous, allowing it to see in low light conditions. Its scales are a deep indigo and silver, providing camouflage in the dark depths.
all.imagePrompt: Create an image of a bioluminescent fish with long, flowing fins and bulbous eyes. The fish should be depicted in a deep sea trench environment and surrounded by other deep sea creatures.

abilities.name: Bioluminescence
abilities.description: The Glowfin can emit a bright, glowing light from its scales at will. This allows it to dazzle and disorient enemies or attract prey.

abilities.name: Camouflage
abilities.description: The Glowfin's scales are a deep indigo and silver, providing it with natural camouflage in the dark depths of the sea.

abilities.name: Darkvision
abilities.description: The Glowfin can see in darkness as if it were in dim light.

all.name: Kraken's Disciple
all.description: Kraken's Disciples inhabit the deepest trenches of the ocean. They resemble humanoid octopuses with slick, jet-black skin and glowing blue eyes. They use their long tentacles to navigate the underwater environment and to ensnare their prey.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a humanoid octopus with slick, jet-black skin and glowing blue eyes. The creature should have long, thin tentacles that it can use to navigate the dark, underwater environment.

all.name: Frostfang
all.description: Frostfangs are a species of predatory aquatic creatures that lurk in the frigid waters of the polar regions. They are large, serpentine in shape, and covered in thick, ice-like scales that reflect their surroundings, making them practically invisible. Their jaws are lined with rows of razor-sharp teeth and they are capable of swimming at incredible speeds.
all.imagePrompt: Create an image of a large, serpentine creature that lives in icy waters. The creature should be covered in thick, ice-like scales and have rows of razor-sharp teeth in its jaws.

all.name: Tidal Drake
all.description: Tidal Drakes are large, serpent-like creatures that inhabit deep ocean trenches. They have sleek, blue scales and bioluminescent markings on their backs and bellies. Their heads resemble that of a crocodile, with sharp teeth and powerful jaws. Tidal Drakes can breathe underwater and are known for their incredible speed and agility.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a Tidal Drake, a fearsome, sea-dwelling serpentine creature with sleek, blue scales and bioluminescent markings. Its head should resemble that of a crocodile with sharp teeth and a powerful jaw. It should be depicted swimming through the deep ocean with incredible speed and agility.

all.name: Aquatic Kraken
all.description: The Aquatic Kraken is a massive, squid-like creature known for its deadly tentacles and insatiable hunger. It inhabits the deepest ocean trenches, and is rarely seen by human eyes. Its body is armored with tough, scaly skin, and its tentacles can stretch up to 50 feet in length. A pair of glowing red eyes stare menacingly from its head, and its razor-sharp beak is strong enough to crush even the toughest bones.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a massive, squid-like creature with glowing red eyes, tough, scaly skin, and long, deadly tentacles. The creature should appear to be lurking in the dark depths of the ocean.

attacks.name: Ink Spray
attacks.effect: The Aquatic Kraken sprays a cloud of black ink, blinding all creatures within a 30-foot radius for 1d4 rounds.

specialTraits.name: Amphibious
specialTraits.description: The Aquatic Kraken can breathe both water and air.

specialTraits.name: Regeneration
specialTraits.description: The Aquatic Kraken regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight.

specialTraits.name: Legendary Actions
specialTraits.description: The Aquatic Kraken can take 3 legendary actions per round, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The Aquatic Kraken regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendaryActions.name: Tentacle Strike
legendaryActions.description: The Aquatic Kraken makes one tentacle attack.

legendaryActions.name: Ink Spray
legendaryActions.description: The Aquatic Kraken uses its Ink Spray ability.

legendaryActions.name: Crushing Grip
legendaryActions.description: The Aquatic Kraken wraps one tentacle around a creature within 30 feet and makes a Tentacle Strike attack at disadvantage. On a hit, the target is grappled (escape DC 20) and takes 2d10 + 8 bludgeoning damage. Until the grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the Aquatic Kraken can't use the same tentacle on another target.

all.name: Sand Lurker
all.description: The Sand Lurker is a creature that inhabits the sandy dunes of the desert. It has a sleek, camouflaged body that makes it almost impossible to spot until it attacks. The creature has four legs and a tail that it uses to navigate the sandy terrain. Its sharp claws and teeth make it a fearsome predator.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a sleek, camouflaged creature with sharp claws and teeth that blends seamlessly with the sandy dunes of the desert. The creature should have four legs and a tail it uses to navigate the sandy terrain.

specialAbilities.name: Camouflage
specialAbilities.description: As an action, the Sand Lurker can blend into the sandy terrain, becoming almost invisible. The creature gains advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in sandy environments.

specialAbilities.name: Sand Tunneler
specialAbilities.description: The Sand Lurker can burrow through sand at a speed of 30 feet. While burrowed, the creature is immune to non-magical attacks and can move freely through sand.

all.name: Aqueous Wraith
all.description: Aqueous Wraiths are ethereal beings that haunt the deep sea. They appear as translucent, humanoid figures made entirely of water. They are harmless to most sea creatures, but have a thirst for human souls. They lure sailors and divers to their deaths with their entrancing water dances.
all.imagePrompt: Design a ghostly, humanoid creature made entirely of water, with a slightly sinister expression. It should be partially transparent and appear to be floating effortlessly in the deep sea.

attacks.name: Soul Drain
attacks.special: If the target is a humanoid with a soul, and the attack reduces it to 0 hit points, the Aqueous Wraith absorbs its soul, preventing any form of resurrection.

all.name: Aqua Goliath
all.description: The Aqua Goliath is a large, deep sea creature that resembles a mix between an angler fish and a squid. It has a large, bulbous head with a menacing mouth full of sharp teeth and a bioluminescent lure on a stalk atop its head. Its eight long tentacles are lined with small, sucker-like appendages, and a pair of large, fan-like fins allow it to move gracefully through the water.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large, deep sea creature that resembles a mix between an angler fish and a squid. It should have a large, bulbous head with a menacing mouth full of sharp teeth and a bioluminescent lure on a stalk atop its head. Its eight long tentacles should be lined with small, sucker-like appendages, and a pair of large, fan-like fins should be located on its back.

abilities.name: Bioluminescence
abilities.description: The Aqua Goliath can emit a bright light from its bioluminescent lure on its head, illuminating an area up to 60 feet in all directions.

abilities.name: Ink Cloud
abilities.description: The Aqua Goliath can release a cloud of ink in a 30-foot radius, causing all creatures within the area to be blinded for 1 minute. This ability can be used once per day.

all.name: Frostbite Crawler
all.description: Frostbite Crawlers are large, arthropod-like creatures that inhabit icy environments. They have eight spindly legs and a flat, oval-shaped body covered in thick, white fur to keep warm. Their most striking feature is their long, segmented tail that ends in a sharp icicle spike, which they use to impale prey.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large, arthropod-like creature with spindly legs and a thick, white fur body. The creature should have a long, segmented tail that ends in a sharp, icicle spike. The environment should be an icy terrain.

all.name: Aqua Viper
all.description: The Aqua Viper is a serpent-like creature with iridescent scales that refract light, making them appear to change color as the creature slithers through the water. Its body is long and slender, with a flattened tail fin and a narrow head featuring sharp teeth and a forked tongue. The Aqua Viper can breathe both water and air, allowing it to move between underwater and surface environments. Its speed and agility make it a skilled hunter, able to quickly catch fish and other prey.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a serpentine creature with iridescent scales that appear to refract light, giving the creature a constantly changing color pattern as it moves through the water. The creature should have a narrow head with sharp teeth and a forked tongue, and a long, slender body with a flattened tail fin.

all.name: Swamp Serpent
all.description: The Swamp Serpent is a massive creature that lives in the murky waters of the swamp. It has a long, slender body covered in slimy mottled scales that allow it to blend into its surroundings. Its eyes glow in the dark, and it has sharp teeth and powerful jaws that it uses to snatch prey from the water's edge. It is a solitary creature that only comes together with others of its kind during mating season.
all.imagePrompt: Create an image of a massive serpent-like creature slithering through the murky waters of the swamp. It should have slimy, mottled scales that blend in with the environment, glowing eyes, and sharp teeth.

all.name: Frostbite Fury
all.description: Frostbite Furies are fearsome creatures that inhabit icy environments. They are large, reptilian beasts covered in thick, white fur and sharp, crystalline spines. Their jaws are lined with serrated teeth that can crush bone, and they are able to exhale icy blasts that can freeze their prey in place.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a fearsome, reptilian creature covered in thick, white fur and sharp, crystalline spines. The creature's jaws should be lined with serrated teeth, and it should have the ability to exhale icy blasts that can freeze its prey in place. The creature should appear to blend seamlessly with the icy environment it inhabits.

all.name: Frostfang
all.description: Frostfangs are large, wolf-like creatures that inhabit the snowy tundras of the north. They are covered in thick, shaggy fur that protects them from the freezing temperatures. Their white fur allows them to blend in with the snowy surroundings, making them difficult to spot. Frostfangs have razor-sharp teeth and claws, which they use to hunt their prey. They are known to be fiercely territorial and will defend their territory at all costs.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large, wolf-like creature covered in thick, white shaggy fur. The creature should have razor-sharp teeth and claws and blend seamlessly with the snowy tundra environment.

all.name: Aqua Lurker
all.description: The Aqua Lurker is a predatory creature that dwells in the deepest and darkest parts of the ocean. With its eel-like body, it can glide smoothly through the water. It has six tentacle-like appendages with sharp hooks used for grabbing its prey. Its flat head is adorned with four glowing eyes used for detecting prey in low-light conditions.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a sleek and sinister eel-like creature with six tentacle-like appendages and four glowing eyes, lurking in the dark depths of the ocean.

abilities.name: Darkvision
abilities.description: The Aqua Lurker can see in darkness as if it were dim light.

abilities.name: Camouflage
abilities.description: The Aqua Lurker's skin changes color to blend in with its surroundings.

abilities.name: Amphibious
abilities.description: The Aqua Lurker can breathe both air and water.

all.name: Desert Drake
all.description: Desert Drakes are massive, quadrupedal reptiles covered in sand-colored scales. They have long, powerful tails able to whip up sandstorms, and large, leathery wings capable of creating violent gusts of wind. Their sharp teeth and strong jaws allow them to easily capture their prey, which often consists of smaller mammals and reptiles.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large, quadrupedal reptile covered in sand-colored scales. It should have long, powerful tails and large, leathery wings capable of creating wind gusts.

all.name: Cavern Leviathan
all.description: The Cavern Leviathan is a massive, serpentine creature that dwells deep within underground cave systems. It is covered in thick, armored scales and has six powerful legs that allow it to move effortlessly through the rocky terrain. Its eyes are small and keen, and its jaws are lined with razor-sharp teeth.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a massive, serpentine creature with thick, armored scales, six powerful legs, and razor-sharp teeth. It should appear to blend seamlessly with the rocky terrain of underground cave systems.

all.name: Desert Scythe
all.description: The Desert Scythe is a fearsome creature that inhabits the arid deserts. It has a large, scorpion-like tail that it uses to defend itself and hunt prey. Its body is covered in tough, chitinous armor, and it has six spindly legs that allow it to move quickly across the sand.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a creature with a scorpion-like tail and tough, chitinous armor. Its six spindly legs should be clearly visible, and it should appear to be moving quickly across the desert sand.

all.name: Swamp Skulker
all.description: Swamp Skulkers are short, stocky creatures found in murky swamps. They resemble small crocodiles or alligators with tough, scaly skin that is a mottled brown and green. They have short legs with webbed feet, and a long, powerful tail that propels them through the water. Their eyes, set high on their heads, allow them to keep watch above the waterline while the rest of their bodies are submerged. They are adept at camouflage, blending in seamlessly with the swamp environment.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a short, stocky creature resembling a crocodile or alligator, with tough, scaly skin in mottled brown and green. It should have short legs with webbed feet, a long, powerful tail, and high-set eyes for keeping watch above the waterline. The creature should be submerged in the murky swamp environment and blending in with its surroundings.

all.name: Rock Hopper
all.description: The Rock Hopper is a furry creature that inhabits the mountain environment. Their body is mostly covered in fur, with large, clawed feet that allow them to grip onto rocks and jump from one area to another. Their eyesight is highly-developed and they have a keen sense of smell to locate food and danger.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a furry creature with large, clawed feet that is jumping between rocks in a mountainous environment. Its body should be covered in fur, and it should have large, perked ears and sharp, focused eyes.

all.name: Leafy Skimmer
all.description: Leafy Skimmers are small creatures that flit around in forest environments. They are about the size of a small bird with a long, slender body and large, translucent wings that resemble colorful autumn leaves. Their large eyes give them exceptional vision and allow them to spot potential predators from great distances. Leafy Skimmers feed on nectar and fruit, and have a calm, non-threatening temperament.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a small, bird-like creature with colorful, translucent wings that resemble autumn leaves. The creature should be shown hovering in mid-air, with its long, slender body clearly visible.

all.name: Mountain Drake
all.description: Mountain Drakes are scaled, winged creatures that inhabit the peaks and crags of high mountains. They are quadrupedal with muscular legs and long, sharp claws. Their scales are a deep, earthy brown with hints of gray and green, and their wingspan can reach up to 25 feet. Mountain Drakes are incredibly agile and can fly for hours without rest.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large, scaled creature with muscular legs, sharp claws, and a wingspan of up to 25 feet. It should be depicted in a mountainous environment, with its earthy brown scales blending seamlessly with the surrounding rocks.

all.name: Mountain Tendril
all.description: Mountain Tendrils are large, bipedal creatures that inhabit rocky mountain environments. They have long, thin tentacle-like arms that they use to traverse the rugged terrain, as well as to capture their prey. Their bodies are covered in thick, durable hide that allows them to withstand the harsh elements of the mountains. They have sharp, jagged teeth and a powerful jaw that can easily crush bones.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large, bipedal creature with long, thin tentacle-like arms and jagged teeth. The creature should be covered in thick, durable hide and appear to blend seamlessly with the rocky mountain environment it inhabits.

all.name: Frost Stalker
all.description: Frost stalkers are large, predatory creatures found in icy environments. Their bodies are covered in thick, white fur and their eyes are adapted to see in low-light conditions. They have sharp claws and a set of razor-sharp teeth that can tear through flesh and bone. They are known for their stealthy movements and ability to blend in with their surroundings.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large, white-furred creature with sharp claws and teeth. The creature should appear to be stealthily stalking its prey in an icy environment.

all.name: Swamp Devourer
all.description: The Swamp Devourer is a large, amphibian-like creature that dwells in murky swamps. It has a slick, oily skin that appears to constantly glisten under the dim light of the swamp. Its body is elongated, almost snake-like, with four short, stout legs that allow it to move quickly through the thick muck. The Devourer's eyes are large and bulging, giving it heightened senses in the darkness of the swamp.
all.imagePrompt: Create an image of the Swamp Devourer, a sleek amphibian-like creature that crawls through the murky swamps with four short legs. Its eyes should be noticeably bulbous and protuberant, giving it heightened sensitivity in the darkness.

specialAbilities.name: Swamp Camouflage
specialAbilities.description: The Swamp Devourer's oily skin is not only slick, but it is also an excellent camouflage. When in the water or mud, the Swamp Devourer's greenish-black skin seems to blend effortlessly with its surroundings, giving it significant advantage on stealth rolls when lying in wait for prey.

specialAbilities.name: Acidic Bite
specialAbilities.description: The Swamp Devourer's bite is infused with a strong acidic toxin that causes additional damage to its prey. Any creature bitten by the Swamp Devourer must make a Constitution saving throw or take an additional 1d6 acid damage at the end of each of their turns until they are no longer within 30 feet of the Swamp Devourer.

all.name: Cave Dwellus
all.description: The Cave Dwellus is a blind, vaguely humanoid creature with rough, grey skin and sharp claws. It has long, lanky limbs and no eyes, making it well adapted to living in the eternal darkness of underground caves and caverns. It uses echolocation to navigate its environment and hunt for prey.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a blind, grey-skinned humanoid with lanky limbs and sharp claws, navigating its underground cave environment using echolocation.

specialAbilities.name: Echolocation
specialAbilities.description: The Cave Dwellus can use echolocation to navigate its environment and detect nearby creatures, even in complete darkness.

specialAbilities.name: Camouflage
specialAbilities.description: The Cave Dwellus can blend in with its surroundings and gain advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks while hiding in rocky or cavernous environments.

all.name: Hydrosaur
all.description: The Hydrosaur is a massive, aquatic reptile with a long, sinuous body, and a powerful tail. Its skin is thick and scaly, with shades of green and blue that blend into the surrounding waters. Its powerful jaws are filled with rows of razor-sharp teeth that can tear through flesh with ease. The Hydrosaur is a fierce predator and will attack anything that enters its territory.
all.imagePrompt: Create an image of a massive, aquatic reptile with thick, scaly skin, a long, sinuous body, and powerful jaws filled with razor-sharp teeth. The creature should be shown swimming through murky waters, with dark shadows lurking in the background.

all.name: Terran Digger
all.description: Terran Diggers inhabit deep underground caves. They are small, furry creatures with large, paddle-like feet that enable them to dig and burrow through soil and rock. Their fur is a dull brown color and their eyes are large and adapted for low light conditions. They primarily feed on insects and other small creatures that they find while burrowing.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a small, furry creature with large, paddle-like feet and large, adapted eyes. The creature should appear to be burrowing through soil and rock.

all.name: Mountain Shifter
all.description: Mountain Shifters are humanoid creatures with rough, rocky skin that blends in with the rocks and boulders of their mountain environment. They are muscular and agile, with keen senses and the ability to shift into stone form. They use this ability for both defense and sneaking up on prey.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a muscular humanoid with rough, rocky skin that blends into the mountain environment. The creature should be mid-shift, with some parts of their body appearing more rocky and others still in a more humanoid form. The creature can be holding a weapon or climbing up the side of a cliff.

specialAbilities.name: Stone Form
specialAbilities.description: As a bonus action, the Mountain Shifter can shift into a stone form, gaining resistance to all damage and a climbing speed equal to their regular speed. They cannot attack or cast spells while in this form, but can remain in it for up to 1 hour.

specialAbilities.name: Keen Senses
specialAbilities.description: The Mountain Shifter has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight, hearing, or smell.

all.name: Frost Lurker
all.description: The Frost Lurker is a formidable creature found in icy environments. It appears to be a mix between a bear and a sabretooth tiger, with thick white fur and fearsome claws. It is known for its ability to disappear into the snow and ice, making it difficult to spot.
all.imagePrompt: Create an image of a large, fearsome beast with thick white fur and sharp claws. The creature should be pictured blending seamlessly into a snowy and icy landscape.

abilities.name: Ice Camouflage
abilities.description: The Frost Lurker can use its surroundings to blend in with the environment, gaining advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

abilities.name: Snow Step
abilities.description: The Frost Lurker's large paws allow it to move quickly and easily through snow, ignoring difficult terrain caused by snow.

all.name: Swamp Titan
all.description: The Swamp Titan is a massive, amphibious creature that calls the murky swamps and bogs its home. It has a serpentine body covered in mottled gray scales and several sets of powerful limbs that allow it to move both on land and in water. Its large, bulbous eyes sit atop its flat head, and its wide, fanged mouth is capable of swallowing prey whole.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large, amphibious creature with a serpentine body, mottled gray scales, several sets of limbs, and a wide, fanged mouth. The creature should be shown either in the water or moving through swampy terrain.
behaviors: The Swamp Titan is territorial and fiercely defends its swamp from intruders.
It hides in the murky waters of the swamp, waiting for prey to come close before striking.
Although primarily carnivorous, the Swamp Titan will occasionally feed on aquatic plants and other vegetation.
When threatened, the Swamp Titan will thrash and whip its tail, causing gusts of wind and waves that can knock enemies off their feet.
The Swamp Titan is notoriously difficult to kill, and its scales are prized by hunters and trappers.

abilities.name: Amphibious
abilities.description: The Swamp Titan can breathe both air and water.

abilities.name: Muck Camouflage
abilities.description: The Swamp Titan's mottled gray scales blend in with the murky waters and mud of the swamp, giving it advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

abilities.name: Scent
abilities.description: The Swamp Titan has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

all.name: Cerulean Waverider
all.description: The Cerulean Waverider is a large, aquatic creature that appears to be a cross between a serpent and a jellyfish. It has a long, sinewy body with four translucent, jellyfish-like fins that allow it to glide effortlessly through the water. The creature also has a set of six venomous tentacles that it uses to attack prey.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large, aquatic creature with a sinewy body and four translucent, jellyfish-like fins. The creature should also have six venomous tentacles and a menacing appearance.

all.name: Aquamorph
all.description: Aquamorphs are an amphibious species that inhabit the deep ocean. They possess elongated bodies with flexible spinal fins that allow for fast swimming, and their skin is covered in luminescent scales that emit bright flashes of light as a means of communication. Their eyes are large, allowing them to see in the dark depths, and they have a pair of long, whip-like tentacles that they use for hunting prey.
all.imagePrompt: Create an image of an Aquamorph with elongated body, flexible spinal fins, luminescent scales, large eyes, and whip-like tentacles.

all.name: Aqua Lurker
all.description: Aqua Lurkers are large, eel-like creatures that inhabit the deep sea. They have no visible eyes and their skin is slick and slimy, with bioluminescent patterns along their body. They are known to be highly aggressive and territorial.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large, eel-like creature with slick, slimy skin and bioluminescent patterns along its body. The creature should look fierce and menacing, with no visible eyes.

abilities.name: Bioluminescence
abilities.description: The Aqua Lurker's bioluminescence not only acts as a defense mechanism, it also attracts prey.

abilities.name: Invisibility
abilities.description: The Aqua Lurker can become nearly invisible in the dark ocean depths, making it difficult for prey to see it coming.

abilities.name: Electricity
abilities.description: The Aqua Lurker can deliver a powerful electric shock to stun prey or defend itself against predators.

all.name: Frostjaw Wyvern
all.description: The Frostjaw Wyvern is a creature that inhabits the cold, snowy mountains. It is a large, winged reptile with a serpentine body and sharp, icy fangs that protrude from its jaws. Its scales shimmer with a pale-blue hue, making it difficult to spot against the snowy landscape.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large, serpentine reptile with wings and shimmering pale-blue scales. It should have sharp, icy fangs that protrude from its jaws and blend seamlessly with the snowy mountain environment.

all.name: Mountain Yeti
all.description: The Mountain Yeti is a large humanoid creature that resides in the highest peaks of the mountain range. It stands at 9 feet tall and has white fur covering its entire body. The creature has large hands and feet, perfect for traversing the rocky terrain of its habitat. It also possesses incredibly sharp claws and teeth, making it a formidable predator. Mountain Yetis are known for their incredible strength and agility, making them capable of taking down prey much larger than themselves.
all.imagePrompt: Design a menacing image of a large, white-furred humanoid creature standing atop a rocky mountain peak. The creature should have sharp claws and teeth, and its massive hands and feet should be emphasized.

all.name: Cavern Racer
all.description: Cavern Racers are a pack-hunting species that lurk in the vast underground cave systems. They are slender, sleek quadrupeds with long, muscular legs and a short, bristly fur that ranges from pitch black to deep brown, perfect for blending in the shadows. Equipped with powerful night-vision eyes, they easily navigate through the darkness and chase their prey relentlessly. They hunt in packs of 5-7 and are very protective of their territory.
all.imagePrompt: Create an image of a pack of Cavern Racers in hot pursuit of their prey through an underground cave system. They have long, muscular legs and a short, bristly fur that ranges from pitch black to deep brown. Their eyes glow brightly with a green hue in the dark.

all.name: Grassland Lomber
all.description: Grassland Lombers are massive, horned beasts with shaggy, brown fur that blends seamlessly with the tall grasses of their habitat. They have a broad, flat nose and large, expressive eyes that give them a friendly appearance. Despite their size, they are surprisingly agile and can outrun most predators.
all.imagePrompt: Create an image of a giant, herbivorous creature with shaggy brown fur, sharp, curved horns, and a friendly, almost comical expression. It should be depicted moving gracefully through tall grasses.

all.name: Siren's Wrath
all.description: Siren's Wrath is a creature that inhabits underwater environment. They resemble giant sea turtles with the back shell in the shape of a conch and a pair of bioluminescent fins extending out of the shell. Their body is covered in blue scales that glisten with an iridescent shimmer, and their eyes glow a fiery orange. They are known to use their hypnotic singing voice to lure in prey before attacking them.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a giant sea turtle with a shell in the shape of a conch and a pair of bright bioluminescent fins. The turtle should have blue scales that glisten with an iridescent shimmer, and its eyes should glow with a fiery orange color. It should be shown using its hypnotic singing voice to lure in prey.

all.name: Sand Stalker
all.description: Sand Stalkers inhabit the deserts of the world. They are large, reptilian creatures with rough, scaly skin and a long, muscular tail. They use powerful legs and sharp claws to traverse the sandy terrain with ease. Their eyes are adapted to the bright sunlight, allowing them to see prey from a great distance.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large, reptilian creature with rough, scaly skin and powerful legs. The creature should appear to be searching or stalking prey in the sandy desert environment.

all.name: Sandstalker
all.description: Sandstalkers are a species of reptilian creatures that inhabit the desert. They are fast, agile predators with a distinctive sand-colored pattern on their scales that allows them to blend in seamlessly with the desert terrain. Their long, slender form is supported by four powerful legs, and their serpent-like body can move with lightning speed in any direction.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a creature that resembles a snake but has four powerful legs and a distinctive sand-colored pattern on its scales, allowing it to blend in with the desert terrain. The creature should appear fast, agile, and deadly.

all.name: Cavern Scavenger
all.description: Cavern Scavengers are subterranean creatures that have adapted to a life in dark, damp cave systems. They are small, furry mammals with a keen sense of smell and large ears to navigate in the darkness. Their sharp claws and teeth make them formidable hunters and scavengers. They primarily feed on insects and fungus found in the caves.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a small, furry mammal with sharp claws, large ears, and a keen sense of smell. The creature should be shown navigating through a dark, damp cave system.

specialAbilities.name: Echolocation
specialAbilities.description: The Cavern Scavenger can use its large ears to navigate in complete darkness and has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

specialAbilities.name: Keen Smell
specialAbilities.description: The Cavern Scavenger has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

all.name: Mountain Drake
all.description: Mountain Drakes are large, reptilian creatures that dwell in the high peaks of the mountains. They have four powerful legs and two sets of wings, one for gliding and one for propulsion. Their scales are a deep, earthy brown, and they have a long, thick tail that enables them to maintain their balance while navigating treacherous terrain. Mountain Drakes are known for their fierce, territorial behavior and their potent, acidic breath.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large, reptilian creature with four powerful legs, two sets of wings, deep, earthy brown scales, and a long, thick tail. The creature should appear to be surveying a mountain landscape from a rocky outcrop, with its potent, acidic breath emanating from its fierce, snarling jaws.

all.name: Frostwalker
all.description: Frostwalkers are mysterious creatures that inhabit the icy tundras of the north. They are large, bipedal creatures covered in thick fur that ranges in color from stark white to deep blue. Their eyes are a piercing, glowing yellow. Their long, sharp claws can easily grip the ice and snow, and they use their powerful legs to leap great distances. Despite their size, they are incredibly fast and agile, making them a formidable predator.
all.imagePrompt: Create an image of a large, bipedal creature covered in thick fur and glowing yellow eyes. The creature should look like it is well adapted to living in cold, snowy environments, with long, sharp claws that can grip the ice and snow.

all.name: Frost Fang
all.description: Frost Fangs are ferocious predators that inhabit icy environments. They resemble a cross between a bear and a saber-toothed cat, with thick, white fur and long, sharp fangs. They are solitary creatures that fiercely guard their territory and hunt anything that crosses their path.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large, bear-like creature with thick, white fur, long, sharp fangs, and an overall intimidating presence. The creature should appear perfectly adapted to the icy environment in which it lives, perhaps blending in with the snow and ice.

all.name: Swamp Siren
all.description: The Swamp Siren is a seductive creature with the upper body of a beautiful woman and the lower body of a serpentine creature covered in scales and webbed feet. Their hair is composed of leaves and mud, blending in seamlessly with their environment. Their sweet voices lure unsuspecting prey to their doom, dragging them into the murky depths of the swamp.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a beautiful, alluring woman with a serpentine lower body covered in scales and webbed feet. The creature should be surrounded by muddy water and swamp vegetation, with leaves and mud in her hair.

attacks.name: Seductive Song
attacks.damage: Charisma save or be charmed for one hour

all.name: Aqua Shimmer
all.description: The Aqua Shimmer is a mesmerizing creature that inhabits underwater environments. It resembles a cross between a jellyfish and a sea anemone, with long, delicate tentacles tipped with glowing blue orbs. Its body is translucent and shimmering, reflecting the colors of its surroundings. Aqua Shimmers feed on small fish and plankton, using their tentacles to ensnare prey.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a translucent, jellyfish-like creature with long, delicate tentacles tipped with glowing blue orbs. The rest of its body should appear to shimmer and reflect the colors of the surrounding environment.

specialAbilities.name: Bioluminescence
specialAbilities.description: Aqua Shimmers can create a bright, distracting light with their glowing orbs. They can use this ability to confuse predators or lure prey.

specialAbilities.name: Invisibility
specialAbilities.description: Aqua Shimmers can make themselves invisible by reflecting the colors of their surroundings. They can use this ability to evade predators or ambush prey.

all.name: Luminous Leviathan
all.description: Luminous Leviathans are massive creatures that inhabit the deep ocean. They have a bioluminescent glow that illuminates the dark waters around them. Their body is a mix of colors, with iridescent scales covering their long, serpentine body. They have webbed, fin-like limbs that help them move through the water quickly, and large, glowing eyes that can spot prey from great distances.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a massive serpent-like creature with glowing, iridescent scales and webbed, fin-like limbs that allow it to move gracefully through the water. The creature should have large, glowing eyes that offer an intimidating presence, and a bioluminescent glow that illuminates the surrounding waters.

all.name: Grassland Gazer
all.description: The Grassland Gazer is a creature native to the vast grasslands. It is a herbivore and resembles a large antelope with a sloping back, long, slender legs, and two curled horns. Its fur is golden and shimmers in the sunlight. Its eyes are large and reflective, giving it excellent vision both day and night. They travel in herds and communicate using a series of grunts and bleats.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large, golden antelope-like creature with sloping back, two curled horns, long, slender legs, and large reflective eyes. The creature should be surrounded by the vast grasslands it calls home.

all.name: Desert Shimmer
all.description: The Desert Shimmer is a small, snake-like creature that camouflages itself in the sand. It has iridescent scales that create a shimmering effect in the sunlight. Its body is long and thin, with no visible legs. It uses a series of small fins along its body to move through the sand. Its head is triangular and has two large, reflective eyes. The Desert Shimmer feeds on insects and small rodents that it digs up from the sand.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a small, snake-like creature with iridescent scales that shimmer in the sunlight. The creature should be shown camouflaged in sand, with small fins along its body and large, reflective eyes.

all.name: Cave Crawler
all.description: Cave Crawlers are creepy-crawly creatures that are about the size of a small dog. They have six spindly legs that end in pointed claws, giving them the ability to climb and stick to cave walls and ceilings. Their bodies are covered in a sticky, slimy membrane that allows them to glide through the air if they need to escape danger. Cave Crawlers are blind and rely on their sense of smell to locate prey. They use their sharp mandibles to bite their victims and inject a venom that quickly paralyzes them.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a six-legged creature covered in a sticky, slimy membrane. It should have sharp mandibles and eyes that are adapted to seeing in the dark. It should have a slightly flattened body shape, and be shown clinging to the ceiling of a dark cave.

specialAbilities.name: Venomous Bite
specialAbilities.description: If the Cave Crawler hits with its mandible attack, the target must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or become paralyzed for 1 hour.

specialAbilities.name: Adhesion
specialAbilities.description: The Cave Crawler can move along walls and ceilings as easily as it can on the floor.

all.name: Frost Wyrm
all.description: Frost Wyrms are legendary creatures of the icy wastelands. They resemble large, serpentine dragons with icy-blue scales and luminescent eyes that glow like sapphires. They can freeze anything they touch with their icy breath and can glide effortlessly through the snow and ice.
all.imagePrompt: Create an image of a serpentine dragon with icy-blue scales and glowing sapphire eyes. The dragon should be depicted gliding through the snow and ice of an icy wasteland.

all.name: Prairie Stalker
all.description: Prairie Stalkers are sleek, feline-like creatures that inhabit the wide open grasslands. They are covered in short tan fur with black spots and have sharp, retractable claws. Their long tail allows them to make sudden direction changes while sprinting after prey.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a tan-furred, feline-like creature with black spots and retractable claws. The creature should be depicted sprinting across the open grasslands, with its tail extended and ready to make sudden changes in direction.

all.name: Elderswamp Revenant
all.description: Elderswamp Revenants are ancient, shambling creatures that haunt the murky depths of swamps. They are massive, humanoid creatures, with dense, matted fur and glowing, yellow eyes that seem to peer straight into one's soul.
all.imagePrompt: Create an image of a towering, hairy creature with unnaturally long arms and legs. It should appear to be covered in moss and filth, with glowing yellow eyes that seem to stare straight into the viewer's soul.

abilities.name: Foul Reek
abilities.description: The Elderswamp Revenant emanates a foul odor that sickens anyone within 30 feet unless they succeed in a Constitution saving throw.

abilities.name: Unnatural Resilience
abilities.description: The Elderswamp Revenant is highly resistant to damage from nonmagical attacks.

all.name: Cave Dweller
all.description: Cave Dwellers are blind, subterranean creatures with a serpentine body shape. They have pale, hairless skin and long, sharp claws for digging through the earth. Their sense of hearing is highly attuned to vibrations, and they use it to navigate and locate prey in the dark underground caves.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a blind, serpentine creature with pale, hairless skin and long, sharp claws. The creature should appear to be in a dark, underground cave, navigating using its highly attuned sense of hearing.

all.name: Frost Wyrm
all.description: Frost Wyrms are massive, serpentine creatures that dwell in icy environments. They have a thick layer of scales that range in color from pale blue to white and are covered in a thin layer of frost. Their heads are adorned with two horns that curve backwards and their eyes have a piercing blue glow. They can fly but prefer to move across the ground, leaving behind a trail of frost wherever they go.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a massive, serpentine creature with ice blue scales and a thin layer of frost. The creature should have two curved horns on its head and glowing blue eyes. It should be depicted moving across the icy terrain, leaving a trail of frost in its wake.

all.name: Prairie Gazer
all.description: The Prairie Gazer is a medium-sized herbivorous creature with a stout build, a short neck, and an elongated snout. Their bodies are covered in mottled brown and black fur, allowing them to blend in with the tall grasses of their environment. Prairie Gazers have a set of small, stubby horns on their forehead and a row of bristly spines down their back. They are known for their exceptional eyesight, which helps them spot predators from afar.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a stout creature with mottled brown and black fur, a short neck, and an elongated snout. The creature should be shown blending in with the tall grasses of a grassland environment and have a set of small, stubby horns on its forehead and a row of bristly spines down its back.

all.name: Prarie Stomper
all.description: The Prarie Stomper is a large herbivorous quadruped that roams the grasslands of the world. It has a shaggy brown coat and a wide, flat head with large, curved horns. Its strong legs end in cloven hooves that can easily crush through dense brush.
all.imagePrompt: Create an image of a large, shaggy quadruped with curved horns and powerful legs. The creature should appear to be grazing in a wide, open grassland.

all.name: Cavern Wraith
all.description: Cavern Wraiths reside deep in underground caves, preferring the darkness and solitude. They are shadowy, ghost-like creatures with elongated limbs and long, wispy hair that seems to be made of darkness. Their bodies are translucent, making them difficult to see in the dim light of their environment.
all.imagePrompt: Create an image of a specter-like creature with elongated limbs and wispy, dark hair. The creature should have a translucent body, blending in with the dark cave environment it inhabits.

all.name: Oceanglimmer
all.description: Oceanglimmers are a type of bioluminescent jellyfish-like creatures that inhabit the deep ocean. They have a bell-shaped body that can grow up to three feet in diameter, with multiple long and slender tentacles that glow with a bright blue light. Their body is translucent and reflects the colors of the surrounding environment, allowing them to blend seamlessly into their surroundings. They feed on small fish and plankton by capturing them with their tentacles and releasing toxins to paralyze their prey.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large, bell-shaped creature with long, slender tentacles that emit a blue, bioluminescent light. The creature should appear to blend seamlessly with the surrounding ocean environment.

specialAbilities.name: Bioluminescence
specialAbilities.effect: Oceanglimmers emit a bright blue light from their tentacles that can be used to illuminate dark areas. This ability can also be used to startle or distract predators.

specialAbilities.name: Paralyzing Toxins
specialAbilities.effect: When Oceanglimmers capture prey with their tentacles, they release toxins that can paralyze their prey. The effects of the toxin last for 1d4 rounds.

all.name: Mountain Drake
all.description: Mountain Drakes are large, ferocious beasts that inhabit high altitude mountain ranges. They have scales that range in color from gray to brown to green and have long, powerful limbs with sharp claws for scaling the rough terrain of the mountain. Their wingspan is impressive, and they can glide for long distances, swooping down on prey from above. Their main diet consists of small mammals and birds, but they have been known to attack larger prey in packs.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large, reptilian creature with sharp claws and a formidable wingspan. The creature should be depicted scaling a mountain and swooping down on a hapless prey animal.

all.name: Aurora Swimmer
all.description: Aurora Swimmers are bioluminescent creatures that inhabit the deep ocean. Their body consists of a translucent, gelatinous sphere with iridescent blue and purple stripes. They have long, tentacle-like appendages that trail behind them and are adorned with glowing tips. They feed on plankton and small fish by capturing them with their tentacles.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a gelatinous sphere with iridescent blue and purple stripes. The sphere should have long, tentacle-like appendages with glowing tips trailing behind it. The creature should appear to be swimming in a dark, abyssal environment.

specialAbilities.name: Bioluminescence
specialAbilities.description: As a bonus action, the Aurora Swimmer can activate its bioluminescence and shed bright light in a 15-foot radius. This light persists for 3 turns and can be used once per long rest.

specialAbilities.name: Translucent
specialAbilities.description: The Aurora Swimmer has advantage on Stealth checks to hide in underwater environments.

all.name: Rock-Walker
all.description: Rock-Walkers are large, bipedal creatures that inhabit mountain environments. Their rocky exterior camouflage helps them blend in to their surroundings. They have long, muscular legs, a hinged jaw with sharp teeth, and strong arms with large claws for digging and climbing. They are nocturnal and have excellent night vision.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large, rocky creature standing on two legs with long, muscular legs, large claws for digging and climbing, and a hinged jaw with sharp teeth. The creature should appear to blend seamlessly with the rocky mountain environment it inhabits.

all.name: Desert Stalker
all.description: The Desert Stalker is a creature that blends in with its arid surroundings. Its skin is a sandy brown color, and it has a slender body with long, powerful legs. Its eyes are located on the sides of its head and it has large, pointy ears that help it detect prey. The Desert Stalker is a carnivore that hunts small rodents and insects. It is known for its speed, agility, and stealth.
all.imagePrompt: Create an image of a four-legged creature with a sandy brown color. The creature should have long, powerful legs and large, pointy ears. Its eyes should be located on the sides of its head, and it should appear to be moving quickly through a desert environment.

all.name: Frost Peak Hunter
all.description: Frost Peak Hunters are elusive creatures that live in snowy mountains. They have thick, white fur that blends in perfectly with the snow, and sharp, curved horns that they use to impale prey. They are highly territorial and only emerge from their dens to hunt small animals or defend their territory.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large, furry creature with thick, white fur, sharp, curved horns, and a fierce expression. The creature should be shown in a snowy mountain landscape.

all.name: Swamp Fiend
all.description: Swamp Fiends are large, amphibious creatures that inhabit the murky swamps. They resemble a cross between a crocodile and a leech, with slimy, scaly skin and rows of sharp teeth. They lurk below the surface of the water, waiting for prey to come close before dragging them under and devouring them.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large, amphibious creature with slimy, scaly skin and rows of sharp teeth. The creature should be partially submerged in murky water, with only its eyes, snout, and spiny back protruding above the surface.

all.name: Sand Stalker
all.description: Sand Stalkers are predatory creatures found in the deserts. They have a sleek, muscular body covered in sand-colored fur, a long tail for balance, and large, sharp claws. They are expert climbers and can even ascend sheer cliffs with ease.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large, muscular, furry creature with sand-colored fur, a sinuous tail, and sharp claws that is perfectly adapted for stalking prey in the desert.

specialAbilities.name: Sand Sprint
specialAbilities.description: The Sand Stalker can double its speed when running or climbing on sand or loose dirt.

specialAbilities.name: Expert Climber
specialAbilities.description: The Sand Stalker can climb sheer surfaces as easily as walking on flat ground.

all.name: Swamp Stalker
all.description: Swamp Stalkers are large, reptilian creatures that resemble a cross between an alligator and a snake. They have a dull green, scaly body and long, muscular tail that propels them through the murky swamp water. Their eyes are large and yellow, and they have sharp teeth and claws for hunting prey.
all.imagePrompt: Create an image of a large reptilian creature with a scaly, green body, sharp teeth, and a muscular tail that propels it through the swamp water.

specialAbilities.name: Swamp Camouflage
specialAbilities.description: The Swamp Stalker can blend in with its surroundings, granting advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks when it is hiding in the swamp water.

specialAbilities.name: Swamp Dweller
specialAbilities.description: The Swamp Stalker is immune to disease and poison and can hold its breath for up to 15 minutes.

all.name: Aqueon
all.description: Aqueons are a type of creature that inhabit the depths of the ocean. They resemble large, fish-like creatures with a long, slender body and a series of bioluminescent appendages along their sides. They are carnivorous and have powerful jaws for catching prey.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large, fish-like creature with a long, slender body and bioluminescent appendages. The creature should appear to be swimming in the dark depths of the ocean.

all.name: Frost Lurker
all.description: Frost Lurkers inhabit icy environments. They resemble large, bipedal reptiles with rough, scaly skin and sharp, icicle-like spines protruding from their back.
