Their eyes are a piercing blue and seem to glow in the dark. They feed on frozen prey by using their powerful jaws to crush the ice and consuming the thawed remains.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large, bipedal reptile-like creature with rough, scaly skin and sharp, icicle-like spines protruding from their back. Its eyes should be a piercing blue and seem to glow in the dark. The creature should appear to blend seamlessly with the icy environment it inhabits.

all.name: Cave Dweller
all.description: The Cave Dweller is a subterranean creature that is roughly the size of a human. It has a hairless, pale body that is adapted for life in the darkness of the caverns it inhabits. It has large, sensitive ears and eyes, but they are poorly adapted to bright light.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a humanoid creature with a hairless, pale body and large, sensitive ears and eyes. The creature should appear to be adapted for life in a dark, underground cavern.

abilities.name: Darkvision
abilities.description: The Cave Dweller can see in darkness as if it were dim light.

abilities.name: Keen Hearing
abilities.description: The Cave Dweller has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

abilities.name: Light Sensitivity
abilities.description: In bright light, the Cave Dweller has disadvantage on attack rolls and Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

all.name: Crimsand Scorpion
all.description: The Crimsand Scorpion is a large, aggressive arthropod that lives in the arid deserts. It has a tough exoskeleton that is crimson in color, with sandy yellow highlights. Its powerful pincers snap shut with deadly force and its sharp tail stinger can inject a venom that can incapacitate its prey.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large arachnid-like creature with crimson exoskeleton and sandy yellow highlights. It should have large pincers and a long tail with a sharp stinger.

abilities.name: Venomous Sting
abilities.description: Once per turn, the Crimsand Scorpion can choose to inject venom with its tail sting attack. The target must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or become paralyzed for 1 minute.

abilities.name: Camouflage
abilities.description: When the Crimsand Scorpion is in a sandy or rocky environment, it can use its natural coloration to blend in and become more difficult to spot. Attacks against it have disadvantage unless the attacker succeeds on a DC 14 Wisdom (Perception) check.

all.name: Mountain Leviathan
all.description: The Mountain Leviathan is a massive, serpent-like creature that dwells in the highest peaks of the world. Its scales are a dark, earthy brown and it has two powerful, clawed arms that sprout from its sides. Its head is crowned with a pair of sharp, ivory horns and its eyes glow with an otherworldly light. It moves with a serpentine grace and is able to climb sheer cliffs and traverse narrow ridges with ease.
all.imagePrompt: Create a towering image of a serpent-like creature with dark, earthy brown scales, two powerful clawed arms, and ivory horns adorning its head. Its eyes should glow with an otherworldly light and it should be depicted climbing a sheer cliff face or traversing a narrow ridge.

traits.name: Mountain Climber
traits.description: The Mountain Leviathan can climb sheer surfaces and traverse narrow ridges without difficulty.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.description: The Mountain Leviathan regains 10 hit points per round if it has more than half of its total hit points and it is not taking acid or fire damage.

all.name: Sand Drake
all.description: Sand Drakes are a common sight in the arid deserts of the world. They resemble large, snake-like creatures with sharp, angular scales and a pair of powerful, leathery wings. Their long, muscular bodies are well-suited to burrowing deep into the sand to escape predators and hunt for prey.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large, snake-like creature with sharp, angular scales and a pair of leathery wings. The creature should appear camouflaged against the sandy desert background, with its long body coiled and ready to strike.

all.name: Sand Stalker
all.description: Sand Stalkers are predatory creatures found in the deserts. They have a sleek, muscular body covered in sand-colored fur, a long tail for balance, and large, sharp claws. They are expert climbers and can even ascend sheer cliffs with ease.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large, muscular, furry creature with sand-colored fur, a sinuous tail, and sharp claws that is perfectly adapted for stalking prey in the desert.

specialAbilities.name: Sand Sprint
specialAbilities.description: The Sand Stalker can double its speed when running or climbing on sand or loose dirt.

specialAbilities.name: Expert Climber
specialAbilities.description: The Sand Stalker can climb sheer surfaces as easily as walking on flat ground.

all.name: Swamp Stalker
all.description: Swamp Stalkers are large, reptilian creatures that resemble a cross between an alligator and a snake. They have a dull green, scaly body and long, muscular tail that propels them through the murky swamp water. Their eyes are large and yellow, and they have sharp teeth and claws for hunting prey.
all.imagePrompt: Create an image of a large reptilian creature with a scaly, green body, sharp teeth, and a muscular tail that propels it through the swamp water.

specialAbilities.name: Swamp Camouflage
specialAbilities.description: The Swamp Stalker can blend in with its surroundings, granting advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks when it is hiding in the swamp water.

specialAbilities.name: Swamp Dweller
specialAbilities.description: The Swamp Stalker is immune to disease and poison and can hold its breath for up to 15 minutes.

all.name: Aqueon
all.description: Aqueons are a type of creature that inhabit the depths of the ocean. They resemble large, fish-like creatures with a long, slender body and a series of bioluminescent appendages along their sides. They are carnivorous and have powerful jaws for catching prey.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large, fish-like creature with a long, slender body and bioluminescent appendages. The creature should appear to be swimming in the dark depths of the ocean.

all.name: Savannah Stalker
all.description: The Savannah Stalker is a large, cat-like creature with golden fur and black stripes. Its legs are long and powerful, allowing it to run great distances across the vast grasslands it calls home. Its sharp claws and teeth make it a formidable predator, while its keen senses and stealthy nature allow it to sneak up on prey undetected.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large, cat-like creature with golden fur and black stripes. It should have long, powerful legs and sharp claws and teeth. The creature should be depicted stalking through the tall grasses of the savannah, eyes fixed greedily on its prey.

attacks.name: Pounce
attacks.description: If the Savannah Stalker moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the Savannah Stalker can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

all.name: Bog Maw
all.description: Bog Maws are large, carnivorous creatures that dwell in the murky swamps. They have slick, black scales that help them blend into the shadows, and their long, slender snouts are filled with razor-sharp teeth. They are known to ambush their prey from below the surface of the water, dragging them down to their watery lair.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large, reptilian creature with slick, black scales and a long, slender snout filled with razor-sharp teeth. The creature should be partially submerged in water, with only its eyes and snout visible above the surface.

specialAbilities.name: Amphibious
specialAbilities.description: Bog Maws can breathe both air and water.

specialAbilities.name: Submerge
specialAbilities.description: The Bog Maw can submerge itself in water, gaining advantage on its next attack.

all.name: Glowfin
all.description: Glowfins are bioluminescent creatures that inhabit deep underwater environments. They have a slender, eel-like body with a shimmering blue-green iridescence. Their fins are long and narrow, resembling delicate feathers. Glowfins feed on plankton and small fish, using their sharp teeth to snare their prey.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a sleek, eel-like creature with shimmering blue-green iridescence and long, feather-like fins. The creature should emit a soft glow from its body and appear to be swimming gracefully through a dark, underwater environment.

specialAbilities.name: Bioluminescence
specialAbilities.description: Glowfins emit a soft, blue-green light from their body, making them highly visible in dark underwater environments.

specialAbilities.name: Swim Speed
specialAbilities.description: Glowfins have a natural swim speed of 60 feet.

all.name: Frostborne Behemoth
all.description: The Frostborne Behemoth is a hulking creature that prowls the icy tundras. It has a thick, white fur coat that insulates it from the freezing temperatures, and massive, curved horns that serve both as a weapon and as a tool for digging through snowdrifts. Its glowing blue eyes can see through even the thickest blizzard, and it has a keen sense of smell that it uses to track prey.
all.imagePrompt: Create an image of a massive, furry creature with curved horns, glowing blue eyes, and a thick coat of white fur. The creature should be shown wandering through a bleak and barren icy landscape.

all.name: Hydrobloom
all.description: Hydroblooms are ethereal creatures that glide through the depths of the ocean. Their transparent bodies resemble that of a jellyfish and are adorned with bioluminescent, flower-like tentacles that pulsate with a soft glow. They feed on plankton and small fish, which they capture using their tentacles.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of an ethereal underwater creature with a transparent, jellyfish-like body and bioluminescent, flower-like tentacles that pulsate with a soft glow. The creature should appear to be gliding gracefully through the ocean depths.

all.name: Desert Wraith
all.description: The Desert Wraith is a translucent, ghost-like creature that stalks the sandy dunes of the desert. It has four spindly, almost insectoid legs that barely touch the ground and a long wisp of a tail that trails behind it as it moves. The Wraith is nearly invisible to the naked eye, blending in with the sand and shimmering in the sun. It feeds on small desert animals and can phase through solid objects.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a ghostly, translucent creature with spindly legs and a long, wisp-like tail. The creature's body should look like it is made of sand and almost blend in with the desert environment around it.

all.name: Glacier Drake
all.description: The Glacier Drake is a large, reptilian creature that inhabits icy environments. It has thick, white scales that blend in with the snowy terrain. Its body is streamlined and muscular, able to move quickly over treacherous ice. The drake's wings are made of translucent, frosty membranes and it has a long, powerful tail. The creature's eyes are a piercing blue and its breath is an icy blast.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large, reptilian creature with white scales that blend in with a snowy environment. The creature should have a streamlined body with muscular legs and a long, powerful tail. Its wings should be translucent and frosty, and its eyes a piercing blue.

specialAbilities.name: Ice Walk
specialAbilities.description: The Glacier Drake can move across icy surfaces without difficulty, even at high speeds.

specialAbilities.name: Frost Aura
specialAbilities.description: The Glacier Drake emits an aura of cold around it, dealing 5 cold damage to any enemy within 10 feet at the start of their turn.

all.name: Verdant Strider
all.description: Verdant Striders inhabit lush forests. They resemble large, quadrupedal insects with long, slender legs and vibrant green, leaf-like wings. They feed on tree sap using their sharp, needle-like proboscis and have a symbiotic relationship with the forest.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a large, insect-like creature with long, slender legs, vibrant green, leaf-like wings, and a sharp, needle-like proboscis. The creature should appear to blend seamlessly with the lush forest environment it inhabits.

all.name: Frostclaw
all.description: Frostclaws are a species of predatory creatures native to snowy mountain environments. They are large, muscular quadrupeds with thick white fur and razor-sharp claws. Their eyes are a deep ice blue that seems to glow in the dark. They hunt in packs and are known for their keen senses and deadly ambushes.
all.imagePrompt: Design an image of a massive, imposing quadruped with thick white fur and razor-sharp claws. The creature's eyes should be a deep, glowing ice blue, and it should appear perfectly adapted to its snowy mountain environment.

specialAbilities.name: Pack Tactics
specialAbilities.description: Frostclaws gain advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the frostclaw's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

specialAbilities.name: Winter Camouflage
specialAbilities.description: Frostclaws blend in seamlessly with their snowy mountain surroundings, gaining advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.
